name: Don't Freeze (Jimothy Cardotha)
description:
You have to feed the fire in order to keep it alive.  If you don't, you will freeze!  But wait!  There's a limited amount of wood that you can put on the fire!  Looks like your death is inevitable!

How to Play:

Collect wood by clicking on it. Carry it to the fire and throw the wood on the fire.  Warm up by staying close to the fire.  If you get too far away you start to freeze.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Left Mouse Button to pick up items.

Right Mouse Button to throw items.
